sourcesContent:
List of folders ({{viewTitle}} View)

Filter by:

Filtered by: {{listFilter}}

Folder id Folder name Folder description Folder creation date
{{folder.FolderId}} {{folder.FolderName}} {{folder.FolderDescription}} {{folder.CreationDate}}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { IFolder } from "../models/folder"; @Component({ selector: "app-folder-component", templateUrl: "./folder.component.html" }) export class FolderComponent implements OnInit{ viewTitle: string = "Table"; private _listFilter: string = ""; get listFilter() { return this._listFilter; } set listFilter(value: string) { this._listFilter = value; console.log("In setter: ", value); this.filteredFolders = this.performFilter(value); } folders: IFolder[] = [ { "FolderId": 1, "FolderName": "1st folder!", "FolderDescription": "The very first folder created...", "CreationDate": "Today" }, { "FolderId": 2, "FolderName": "2nd folder!", "FolderDescription": "The 2nd folder created...", "CreationDate": "Today" }, { "FolderId": 3, "FolderName": "3rd folder!", "FolderDescription": "The very 3rd folder created...", "CreationDate": "Today" } ] filteredFolders: IFolder[] = this.folders; performFilter(filterBy: string): IFolder[] { filterBy = filterBy.toLocaleLowerCase(); return this.folders.filter((folder: IFolder) => folder.FolderName.toLocaleLowerCase().includes(filterBy)); } ngOnInit(): void { console.log("FolderComponent created"); } }
